registration.welcomeTextActivationHeader: We are glad to welcome you to our team of moderators.
registration.welcomeTextActivationBody: Your role involves managing and overseeing the operation of the restaurant using our constructor. You will have access to management tools as well as the ability to create and edit menus, manage staff. To complete your registration and start working, you need to activate your account. To do this, follow the link we sent to your email. If you have any questions or difficulties, feel free to contact our support team.

welcomeText.welcomeText: Welcome to Your Online Restaurant Constructor!
welcomeText.createRestaurant: Create your ideal restaurant in a few simple steps:

textAddRestaurant.body1: Start with the basics: Set your restaurant's name, upload a photo for the main background, and optionally a logo.
textAddRestaurant.body2: Provide contact details: Add an address, website, phone numbers, and email address for contact.
textAddRestaurant.footer: Click on '/Create Restaurant/' and move on to the next step in developing your business.

textAddStaff.body1: Forming the team: Add your employees as an administrator, cook, waiter, and bartender by filling out the form with their names, surnames, and birth dates.
textAddStaff.body2: Setting passwords: Create a password for each employee, which they can change later in their personal area. Use the password generation feature to ensure secure access.
textAddStaff.footer: Each employee will receive a unique code to access the system, allowing them to start work immediately.

textAddTable.body1: Organizing space: Navigate to the '/Add Table/' section and create QR codes for each table. Note that each table will be numbered and assigned to a specific menu.

textAddMenu.body1: Developing offerings: Formulate your menu by adding sections, subsections, and related dishes. Optionally, add images to the dishes to make the menu even more appealing to your esteemed clients.
textAddMenu.footer: You can always edit any data about your restaurant, staff, tables, and menu if you spot an error or wish to make changes.

welcomeText.textEnd: Start building your restaurant today and attract customers with a convenient and well-thought-out management system!
